sentences.sContent: There he sees a parson as simple as his flock, a farmer who does not riot on the labour of others.
sentences.sContent_eng: There he sees a parson as simple as his flock, a farmer who does not riot on the labour of others.
sentences.sCn: 在那儿，他看到牧师跟他的教徒一样朴实，牧师也是农民，并不靠别人的劳动来享受。

synos.tran: 牧师，教区牧师；神职人员

trans.tranCn: 牧师，教区牧师；神职人员
